response.answer_text: 47 needed off the last three..Dwayne Bravo is the last recognised batsman. There's only one wicket left and the batsman to come is injured.Still the team against which the odds are stacked up heavily is enjoying the lion share of support at an away venue.Why?? Because it's the returning Chennai super kings who have pulled off many such incredible chases for their fans over the years . And that night again at the Wankhede they did it.  First of all I'd say this is one rather immature way of putting things through.Ya their success and their unmatchable consistency surely raises many eyeballs but associating everything they have achieved to fixing isn't fair I guess.  Speaking of the 2013 IPL spot fixing scandal that hit indian Cricket , no csk player was involved in the incident..The ban on them was because of their co owner Gurunath Meiyappan violating the general code of conduct and involving in betting. To put things into broader perspective even that isn't a crime in many territories outside India.  And coming to their success , their formula has been simple. Cricket is a team game ,so u don't necessarily need superstars to win you every other game.Righy from the first season CSK have had a reliable core bunch of players, an exemplary captain in the form of Mahendra Singh Dhoni and a cool support staff. Csk now is much more than just a team to their fans. As many have noted it has transformed into a cultural phenomenon across India. The CSK social media handles were working and active during the two years of exile imposed on them. The fan interaction programs undertaken by the franchise have been unmatchable. Then comes IPL 11. So called experts and ones with vast knowledge of the game write off Chennai even before the tournament starts.What happens after thay is one for the folklore. Qualifying for the playoffs in all the 9 seasons that they have been part of , seven finals in 9 editions , the sheer entertainment provided by the franchise are just proofs that it's been their strategies , their focus on core building, their honest attempts to take the franchise to new heights that have paid off and not fixing and stuff.. So till then CSK whistle podu

Two years ban and a mighty comeback this season might have propelled you to ask such questions. Firstly, let me tell you csk was not banned for match fixing rather it was banned because one of its team official was found guilty of betting and there is a huge difference between fixing and betting. Coming to the question whether Csk fix matches let me tell you if Csk fix matches then every other team is also involved in fixing rather the entire Ipl is fixed .It can never be a case of Csk fixing a match to lose it, looking at its success over the year.If Csk wins by fixing the match it means they fix the opposition team captain or the players to do mistake in the field or to take wrong decisions which inversely means that the opposition team has fixed the match more than Csk did .And if you think they fix the umpire you need to ask a question in the same platform -’’Which team has never suffered or never got the benifit because of wrong umpiring in the history of cricket?”.Every team (leave Csk) of this Ipl have sometime got the benifit of wrong umpiring and some other time suffered because of the same.You cannot call a team fixer for that. Let me ask a question , do you think a man of Msd's stature who has been named the richest cricketer in the world multiple times and has been one of the richest sports person in the world would fix matches for a few crores of rupees. Lastly , Csk is the most successful team because it has Msd as its captain.And if you think Msd fixed matches to become successful than my friend you need to ask yourself whether he fixed international matches to win 3 ICC trophies for our country. P.s-To all those fans who think I claimed a team owner is the richest man in the country and he can fix matches . I never mean that infact I wanted to say how some cricket fans out of frustration when their favourite team lose matches blames the opposition and umpires of fixing.Man can you show me a single cricket team in the world that never suffered of wrong decisions made by umpires. Edit 1-As the answer is not to offend any cricket fan , I am editing where I contradicted the fact that you can't blame Csk of fixing because of wrong umpiring by mentioning ‘team owned by the richest man of the country and being benifitted by wrong decisions of umpire can also fix match ’’

As you raised a match fixing point,I would like to add something to it. After the match b/w MI and CSK (IPL11 Opener,8 April 2018), I was watching post match show on Cricbuzz. Show was featuring Zaheer Khan, Joy Bhattacharya, Harsha Bhogle. In that show Harsha Bhogle asked, Harsha Bhogle :- In IPL we have too many nail biting finishes, Who writes the script? In the reply to that, Joy Bhattacharya :- Just try and rehearse a batsmen having hamstring injury, comes out to bat at last and hits scoop shoot and clears the fence. If they can act like this then they should be a bigger super stars. Can we write these kind of scripts? Just imagine. You can’t fix whole match, you can bribe or buyout some player as they did in 2013. Yes lots of betting happens on the match that are illegal that should not happen. It doesn’t have to do much with players. As spectators we should enjoy the sport and get inspired ourself by the fitness that these guys have and the hard work that they have done.

I'll try to be fully unbiased while answering . . . Nd this is not directed towards CSK but for other teams as well 1. Not all the matches are fixed(Almost 20–25% ) . . These are the fair ones where we see some pure cricket 2. Thereare some matches where certain periods of the match are fixed nd after those periods both teams try to win (Almost 50–65% of matches are spot fixed) especially in 1st innings nd first 6 overs of 2nd innings (You just try to analyse some day if you get chance . Analyse it in 4 periods . 0–6 ovrs ,6–10 ,10–15 ,15–20 ovrs nd 0–6 ovrs of second innings you'll find the difference I'm talking about . You'll see suddenly after timeout Wicket falls or 20 runs being scored in 14th or 15 the over or in 5th or 6th over). . Nd also the lodha committee said in his report that players give signals to bookies by changing their bats ,gloves etc .That is the reason why we see the players changing bats or gloves almost every 3 balls in last 5 ovrs 3 Nd there are 3rd category of matches which are fully fixed (Almost 18–31% of matches) Mostly these are those matches where one team wins nd the same team looses in reverse fixture. . .Almost 1st or 2nd home game nd last home game of every time is fixed .Most of the times You'll find home teams winning these games

Not at all. You can't claim that CSK are fixers just because they win all nail biting games. In that case the result of the first league stage match of CSK vs KXIP, where result was the other way, justifies that they do not fix matches, as if that were true then there was no reason to loose that match. And the other thing is, if CSK are fixers then all other 7 teams are the same (no offense). Because if CSK fixed matches by giving money, there surely is one more team to receive that on the other side. Also, CSK are 7 time finalists team and if they were fixing why would they have won only 2 of them. So, there are many reasons to justify that CSK are not fixers. Yes, they were banned for 2 years but many people might not know that it was not for they were fixing but because some of their top officials were caught betting, which is illegal. So, it had nothing to do with players.

I found this question very late. I cant explain this with the detailed scores and player performances. Yes ..! CSK always fixes the matches. I mean attach, affix, secure, bond,bind, tie, lash e.t.c As like Bravo fixed in 1st game , FAF fixed in Qualifier 1 & Watson fixed in final, CSK Players fix the team when CSK is in Bad condition. Hater Leaved the Lobby !!! (1) Greatest Game Fixers of CSK. Dwayne Bravo in #MIvsCSK - 68(30)  Sam Billings in #CSKvsKKR - 56(23)  MS Dhoni in #KXIPvsCSK - 79(44)  Shane Watson in #CSKvsRR - 106(57)  Ambati Rayudu in #SRHvsCSK - 79(37)  MS Dhoni & Rayudu in #RCBvsCSK - 70(34) & 82(53)  Suresh Raina in #CSKvsMI - 75(47)  MSD , Watson & Rayudu in #CSKvsDD - 51(22), 78(40) & 41(24)  MSD in #KKRvsCSK - 43(25)  Ravindra Jadeja in #CSKvsRCB - 3/18  Suresh Raina in #CSKvsRR - 52(35)  Ambati Rayudu in #CSKvsSRH - 100(62)  Lungi Ngidi in #DDvsCSK - 2/14  Lungi Ngidi in #CSKvsKXIP - 4/10  Faf Du Plessis in Qualifier 1 against SRH - 67(42)  Shane Watson in Finals Against SRH - 117(57)  (2) Magicians with the Trophy.         (3) Whistle's are back - Whistle podu express.  (4) Our Logo - Our Pride  Thanks for viewing my gallery :) Hope it created little magic in you.

Whenever CSK wins you start hearing about things like ipl is all fixed and scripted. First of all, for csk to win it is the other team who has to fix match as well. You can only fix to lose a match. So for the game to be scripted, all the players in the other team have to be involved in it. The game has been played by stalwarts like sachin, dravid, ganguly, kumble etc. So were they all involved in a scripted tournament? I think people are confused between fixing, betting vs scripting a match. A player might be involved in fixing where he bowls a certain number of no balls or wides in an over but to script an entire team's victory is to involve each and every player on the field. If indeed going by the internet memes, ipl is scripted then think about sreesanth whose cricketing career was jeopardized just because of the speculation of a fixed No ball. When the entire game is scripted that would be a bit harsh on one player. Isn't it? If the game is scripted, then it would also have been harsh on csk and RR who were banned for betting scandal. When the entire game is scripted, why would those 2teams accept being banned? And yes indeed if the games are scripted, the celebration or the emotions that playes show on the field should make them replace every actor in the industry!

Each and every match of ipl is fixed. If you look at the stats of the players daily, compare results with previous year ipl, you’ll find striking similarity. This year’s ipl is for hyderabad, and its going perfectly as planned. Watch out fans, why do you think ipl is the only place where nail biters happen in every match? But see you may not like this view, but i would like to share with you just one thing, the team which has the highest no consecutive wins in the group stage is the final winner of ipl, go see for yourself. There are many other things as well, but i’m not mentioning it here edit 1: for all the blind fans (watch and enjoy cricket)  edit 2: i might have been wrong about the result. but just when the team sheet was out(goswami as opener instead of williamson), i had serious doubt on SRH victory. Dhawan pausing jadeja just before his wicket was one clear thing even blind fans could see.

Just because CSK wins all nail-biting matches that doesn't mean CSK fix matches. If CSK is entering each & every playoff that means they are paying others teams to lose. Indirectly it means the opposition is involved in it . In other words, the rest 7 teams takes money from CSK to lose match . Overall all 8 teams fix match right ? So sorry to say, but fixing doesn't makes sense just because CSK is all-time best team of T20 league in the world. CSK secret of success ? They are real team.They play with a right team spirit, they don't just rush towards results and concentrate on the process. And at last they have MSD .He is the real leader you know. They way he is handling all those big heroes since 1st season is phenomenal,he teaches the us that how to keep faith on each other when it's about the team.

Its more like a movie. Suppose that you want to make a big budget movie and want to make a blockbuster hit, not critically. Want do we need? Let's see bigger and fancy starcast not necessarily knowing acting2. Glamour 3. Some twist and turns 4. Emotionaliam 5. An expected climax We have it in IPL11. We had a huge starcast mostly who are not young, but still followed by fans  We had an glamour show. And similar to an role of Jaquelene in race3 and our glamour was chris gayle. First nobody bids on him, then initially he doesn't get opportunities, then he hits an century and again he gets out of team. No matter how good you are playing you are just for an item song.  We had twist. Mumbai Indians who are hardly winning any matches but suddenly starts to win all matches and doesn't make to playoff in the end. Like expected that saqeeb salim would something in race3 but he gets only bro saying for no reason This only brings emotionalism. I mean everybody expected that MI or RCB would make it to playoff but none of them did. Also twist of KKR where after auction everybody were criticising team selection made it to top3. And an expected result of CSK winning. And like race3 you had an blockbuster IPL which made lot of money.

I really don’t understand why people are accusing CSK for fixing …I mean people fix matches for losing only right ?But they are champions . If the match is fixed then the losing side only should’ve fixed the match . Why would a winning team fix a match ? So basically you are just trying to pull the legs of CSK fans and enjoy the show here . And even you aren’t courageous enough to ask this question with your name mentioned .. You know this is one stupid question so only you went anonymous …

Yes absolutely. We have 11 mechanics in our team who are so profound in fixing matches. And almost each mechanic has fixed each game for us. I don't know what you meant by the word *fix* . I am going to give you an answer for the word's synonym which are on the lines of this “Repair/Mend/Restore/Rectify”. Let me break it down to you mate. Match 1: Mumbai Indians vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: 118/8 to chase down 166. Main mechanic: Dwayne Bravo 68 (30) Special mentions: Kedar Jadhav scored the winning runs with hamstring injury. Result: Game fixed successfully by 1 wicket. Match 2: Chennai Super Kings vs Kolkata Knight Riders Problem statement: To chase down a mammoth 203 runs. Main mechanic: Sam Billings 56(23) Special mentions: S Watson 42(19) & A Rayudu 39(26) Result: Game fixed successfully by 5 wickets. Match 3: Kings XI Punjab vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: To chase down a mammoth 198 runs. Main mechanic: Thala MS Dhoni 79(44) Special mentions: Csk die-hards were contented and satisfied at watching their vintage Thala Dhoni back roaring. Result: Fixing failed by 4 runs. Match 4: Chennai Super Kings vs Rajasthan Royals Problem statement: Defend blistering 204 runs Main mechanic: Shane Watson 106(57) Special mentions: S Raina 46(29) & S Thakur 2/18 Result: Game fixed successfully by 64 runs. Match 5: Sunrisers Hyderabad vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: Defend 182 runs. Main mechanic: Ambati Rayudu 79(37) Special mentions: D Chahar 3/15 with 17 dot balls. Result: Game fixed successfully by 4 runs. Match 6: Royal Challengers Bangalore vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: Chase down a mammoth total of 206 Main mechanic: A Rayudu 82(53) Special mentions: MS Dhoni 70(34) finishing the game off with a six. Result: Game fixed successfully by 5 wickets. Match 7: Chennai Super Kings vs Mumbai Indians Problem statement: Defend a total of 169. Main mechanic: Suresh Raina 75(47). Special mentions: A Rayudu 46(35) MSD 26(21). Result: Fixing failed by 8 wickets. Match 8: Chennai Super Kings vs Delhi Daredevils Problem statement: Defend a total of 211 runs. Main mechanic: Thala MS Dhoni 51(22) Special mentions: S Watson 78(40) & A Rayudu 41(24) Result: Game fixed successfully by 13 runs. Match 9: Kolkata Knight Riders vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: Defend 177 runs. Main mechanic: Thala MS Dhoni 43(25) Special mentions: S Watson 36(25), Du Plessis 27(15) , S Raina 31(26) & A Rayudu 21(17) Result: Failed fixing by 6 wickets. Match 10: Chennai Super Kings vs Royal Challengers Bangalore Problem statement: Chase down 128 runs. Main mechanic: Sir Ravindra Jadeja 3/18 Special mentions: H Singh 2/22 Result: Game fixed successfully by 6 wickets. Match 11: Chennai Super Kings vs Rajasthan Royals Problem statement: Defend 176 runs. Main mechanic: Suresh Raina 52(35) Special mentions: MS Dhoni 33(23) Result: Fixing failed by 4 wickets. Match 12: Chennai Super Kings vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Problem statement: Chase down 180 runs. Main mechanic: Ambati Rayudu 100(62) Special mentions: S Watson 57(35) Result: Game fixed successfully by 8 wickets. Match 13: Delhi Daredevils vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: Chase down 163 runs. Main mechanic: Lungi Ngidi 2/14 Special mentions: A Rayudu 50(29) Result: Fixing failed by 34 runs. Match 14: Chennai Super Kings vs Kings XI Punjab Problem statement: Chase down 154 runs. Main mechanic: Lungi Ngidi 4/10 Special mentions: S Raina 61(48) & D Chahar 39(20). MSD finished it off in style. Result: Game fixed successfully by 5 wickets. Qualifier 1: Sunrisers Hyderabad vs Chennai Super Kings Problem statement: Chase down 140 runs. Main mechanic: Faf Du Plessis 67(42) Special mentions: S Thakur 15(5) Result: Game fixed successfully by 2 wickets. Me as any other die hard of CSK and Thala Dhoni was so happy that the team is back after 2 long years. The political dispute and dirty works of the anti social elements took the game far away from us to Pune. Nothing stopped us from supporting the team, Nothing deterred our spirits, No loss made us blame any of our players. We will always support CSK till we die. We the fans of CSK are the most devoted bunch you can ever find for any IPL team. So don't get us worked up with these baseless allegations and succumb to the wrath of the CSKians. Just kidding, Chennai Super Kings Ku Whistle podu. Presenting you the mechanics of CSK who have been fixing our games this season.       Enjoy the game. Hope CSK wins the trophy this year. Update: IPL 2018 Finals: Chennai Super Kings Vs Sunrisers Hyderabad Problem statement: Chase down 179 runs. Main mechanic: Shane Watson 117(57) Special mentions: The entire squad, coaches, support staff, physio for giving us CSKIANS 3rd IPL title after 2 year break. Result: Game fixed successfully by 8 wickets. “The old age home perhaps became a savage home”

Since Most answers are by csk loyalists, I would like to answer by keeping the emotion away. The one single answer is No. Not just csk no one can fix matches these days. That era is gone. Even players can't be fixed. The only thing that can be fixed is that particular spot / event. Such as one ball ( ex amir's no ball ) So, the answer is a big NO to match fixing. Might be/might not be - to spot fixing.

If CSK fix matches why would they loose 5 matches out of 14? Csk lost 2 matches in the 1st half and 3 matches in the next half. If you don't like that franchise be calm and don't spread it as a match fixer. Haters always want something to prove them wrong. Now, after seeing the result you people better shut your mouths.  #whistlepodu #CSK # prideofipl

If CSK is fixing matches, then directly it means other teams are doing it as well. Just because you hate a team, you are pin pointing that particular team to make yourself feel better. I don’t think IPL matches are fixed. Yes, there is a lot of illegal betting that goes on, but that doesn’t have big impact on match results. Some dramatic matches are just way too impossible to be fixed.

Where there is money, there is corruption (in this case match fixing) it’s all about money at end of the day. And it is not about money per se, it is what money gives. The sheep follows shepherd. The powerful takes over weak. This question itself is hard to answer by anyone on this form. All people here just speculate and put it in a professional way. So, the answer is “NOBODY KNOWS” until someone is dumb enough to get caught. BTW it doesn’t limit to CSK.

Lol, don't listen to these blind csk fans. BCCI ain't dumb, they know what is right. Csk is the biggest brand in IPL so BCCI would never ban such a team for an invalid reason. Hope you got your answer.

Many of the people say that csk fix matches but if you see qualifier 1 betwesn csk vd hyd u will see that 43 runs needed in 3 overs and shardul thakur comes and makes 15 runs in 5 balls but if u have saw the match u will realise that he has not made runs by his own ,he had made runs because of his luck ,through edge and french cut on both the side of keepers behind the wicket .let example i am giving u money and i will say u to make 4 runs through french cut i dont think u can ever make that .This shot comes by luck and most of the times this shot leads u to the dressing room.

Yes, It is one of the tainted franchises which was suspended for 2 years by Honorable Court of law for involvement in betting and fixing activities. People may like Dhoni and other players but as a franchise csk is tainted and is involved in fixing.
